entry.string: XML-RPC is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: XML-RPC is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: The XML-RPC server module is responsible for exposing certain procedure calls using XML as the transport format. Each command is send as an http request in a specified format. The XML-RPC server answers to that call with a properly formatted XML-RPC response.
entry.translation: Zee XML-RPC serfer mudoole-a is respunseeble-a fur ixpuseeng certeeen prucedoore-a cells useeng XML es zee trunspurt furmet. Iech cummund is send es un http reqooest in a speceeffied furmet. Um de hur de hur de hur. Zee XML-RPC serfer unsvers tu thet cell veet a pruperly furmetted XML-RPC respunse-a.

entry.string: The XML-RPC server can be extended by defining API modules to extend the functionality offered by Xaraya over XML-RPC. The XML-RPC standard is defined at
entry.translation: Zee XML-RPC serfer cun be-a ixtended by deffeening EPI mudooles tu ixtend zee fooncshuneleety ooffffered by Xereya oofer XML-RPC. Zee XML-RPC stunderd is deffeened et

entry.translation: Un XML-RPC inebled serfeece-a cun be-a used tu

entry.string: let Xaraya interoperate with other applications or other Xaraya installations
entry.translation: let Xereya interuperete-a veet oozeer eppleeceshuns oor oozeer Xereya instelleshuns

entry.string: use desktop clients to manage or work with Xaraya
entry.translation: use-a desktup cleeents tu munege-a oor vurk veet Xereya

entry.string: use Xaraya as a Blogging site installation. (Note: the blogger.setTemplate and blogger.getTemplate functions are currently not implemented)
entry.translation: use-a Xereya es a Bluggeeng seete-a instelleshun. (Nute-a: zee blogger.setTemplate und blogger.getTemplate fooncshuns ere-a coorrently nut implemented)

entry.translation: Get inffurmeshun ebuoot zee XML-RPC serfer und its methuds
